title: Dr. K.Prabakaran, KPR Institute Engineering and Technology, Autonomous Engineering Institution, Coimbatore, India
paragraphs: National Award from Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilisers, Government of India 2015, for the contributions; “Aligned Carbon Nanotube/ Polymer Hybrid Electrolyte for High Performance Dye Sensitized Solar Cells”
Life Member in Society for Advancement of Electrochemical Science & Technology (SAEST)
